experiences.title: In Home Sales Consultant
experiences.subtitle: Shaw Communications Inc, Winnipeg, MB.
workDescription: Collaborate with Sales manager to develop and execute strategic plans that drive revenue growth and business goals, build strong customer relationships through consultative selling techniques.
Consistently exceed individual sales targets by 27%, achieving 127% of annual target, through effective pipeline management.

Coach new hires, provide product training and mentorship to sales team members, resulting a 20% increase in team performance, attend industry events and trade shows to meet potential clients to expand customer base.
Track and analyze accurate sales reports and provide insights, resulting in a 15% improvement in sales forecasting accuracy.

experiences.title: Tax Consultant
experiences.subtitle: Liberty Tax Services, Winnipeg, MB.
workDescription: Prepared individual income tax returns and assisted the manager in preparing corporate tax returns, ensuring accuracy and completeness of financial information, and maintained organized records of clients financial documents and statements.

Communicated with clients, stakeholders, and Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) regarding tax processes and requirements, reviewed supporting documentation and responded to requests from colleagues and partners.
